title: Co-founder

title: Co-founder
description: has been delivering web development projects over the last 20 years and brings about an extremely varied knowledge - from software architecture to development team lead skills.  He is a voice of reason, never tiring to help out when something needs doing.

title: Co-founder
description: started out professionally with Ruby in 2005 and later co-founded the budapest.rb Ruby meetup. He now works mostly with the Elixir programming language which he has also contributed to. He also has extensive experience in software architecture and infrastructure. He’s a hobbyist maker.

title: Senior Mobile Developer
description: is our lead mobile application developer and has been delivering multi platform apps for the last 8 years. From native to hybrid applications, he’s always focused on delivering projects with a strong user experience mindset and a can do attitude. Speciality: Android, iOS, Ionic, React Native, JS, FE development, CSS

title: Senior Web Developer
description: is primarily focused on frontend development, using different JS frameworks when needed and creating the stylesheets that translate designs into reality. Speciality: JS FE Engineer, React, Ember.js, Angular, CSS, Ruby on Rails

title: Senior Back-end Developer
description: comes from the telco industry. Whilst you’re more likely to find Zoli working on large and complex Ruby code bases, he doesn’t shy away from large data sets, Elixir processing pipelines or delving into JavaScript frameworks. Speciality: Ruby on Rails, Angular, React, Erlang, Elixir

title: Product Manager-Developer
description: has a diverse skill set that spans Web Development, UI/UX Design, Project Management, Online Marketing, and Product Ownership. With a passion for creating exceptional digital products and experiences.

title: Full-stack Web Developer
description: is one of our more recent starters, developing mostly backend for web applications. Always focused on being useful, helping wherever he can, tries to learn something new every day. His main weapon of choice is Ruby on Rails alongside CI/CD test automations. He likes to experiment with programming languages and making them perform well at what they are not designed for.

title: Web Developer
description: is also one of our more recent starters, developing mostly backend for web applications. Always focused on being useful, helping wherever he can, tries to learn something new every day. Likes to dabble in CSS and React too, although not exactly his specialities. Likes computers, cars, video games (duh) and lots more.

title: Executive Assistant
description: is our in house problem solver. From accounting to back office management she is one we can rely on.

title: Senior Mobile Developer
description: is one of our mobile and web developers having extensive experience in both.

title: DevOps/Sysadmin
description: With over 20 years in the industry, works primarily with Linux and UNIX operating systems and has much experience working with cloud computing suppliers, Amazon Web Services (AWS) in particular, building scalable and resilient web platforms for clients. Speciality: Devops, AWS

title: Web Developer
description: is one of our mobile and web developers having extensive experience in both.

title: Office Manager
description: Lilla is our office manager and makes sure that everything runs smoothly. She is a great asset to the team.

title: Web Developer
description: is one of our mobile and web developers having extensive experience in both.

title: UX Designer
description: has over 5 years of experience in agile software development, first as a React front-end developer before transitioning to UX. She has also worked on freelance UX projects, known for her collaborative and technically-driven design approach.

title: Your title
